Name: firefly-iii-csv-importer
Overview: A tool to import CSV files into Firefly III

firefly_iii_access_token.Name: FIREFLY_III_ACCESS_TOKEN
firefly_iii_access_token.Description: Container Variable: FIREFLY_III_ACCESS_TOKEN - Personal Access Token

firefly_iii_url.Name: FIREFLY_III_URL
firefly_iii_url.Description: Container Variable: FIREFLY_III_URL - URL of Firefly-III instance

json_configuration_dir.Name: JSON_CONFIGURATION_DIR
json_configuration_dir.Description: Container Variable: JSON_CONFIGURATION_DIR - Container path of configuration storage

configurationpath.Name: Configuration Path
configurationpath.Description: Container Path: /configurations - Path to pre-made configuration file
